selection:
void SelectionSort(int a[], int n) {

for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {

int min = i;

for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)

if (a[min] > a[j])

min = j;

if (min == i)

continue;

swap(a[i], a[min]);

}

}
interchange:
void InterchangeSort(int a[], int n) {

for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)

for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)

if (a[i] > a[j])

swap(a[i], a[j]);

}
